Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Loyola
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to mechanical problems on a train. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Loyola due to mechanical problems on a train.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

These may include:

#151 Sheridan

#96 Lunt

#155 Devon

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
